scenes.description: Performance of 'Bibideba' by Hoshimachi Suisei, Sakura Miko, and Shirogane Noel.
Countdown to the New Year 2025 with fireworks and on-screen celebrations.
New Year greetings and transition to the next performance.

subtitles.original: ...tonight
subtitles.english: ...tonight

subtitles.original: ビビデバビデブーワ　ビビデバビデブーワ yeah
subtitles.english: Bibbidi-Bobbidi-Boo-wa Bibbidi-Bobbidi-Boo-wa, yeah

subtitles.original: 今夜に明日はないなら　12時に怒涛門勝ちでしょ
subtitles.english: If there's no tomorrow for tonight, it's a landslide victory at 12 o'clock, right?

subtitles.original: ただ済まれよほ　どんな問題も解法一つ
subtitles.english: Just be done with it, ho. Every problem has one solution.

subtitles.original: 拍手も正解も間違いも　愛す本当の私の気障
subtitles.english: Applause, correct answers, and mistakes—I love them all, the real, affected me.

subtitles.original: あれ何だか正解は限界の　気配がして
subtitles.english: Wait, I feel like the correct answer is reaching its limit.

subtitles.original: 当てられたら安心じゃ心配
subtitles.english: If it hits the mark, it's a worry rather than a relief.

subtitles.original: Ay 今すぐ jumping jumping out
subtitles.english: Ay, jumping jumping out right now.

subtitles.original: チキチキバンバン　チキチキバンバン
subtitles.english: Chiki chiki bang bang, chiki chiki bang bang.

subtitles.original: 威場抱くに危機享楽日々に
subtitles.english: Holding onto prestige in these days of peril and pleasure.

subtitles.original: ギリギリバンバン　弾けみたい大砲
subtitles.english: Giri giri bang bang, like a cannon about to burst.

subtitles.original: 発射してしまおうか
subtitles.english: Shall we fire it off?

subtitles.original: まだまだビビらんなくミニバンシャー
subtitles.english: I'm not scared yet, I'm a mini adventurer.

subtitles.original: 一発じゃ足りないわ
subtitles.english: One shot isn't enough.

subtitles.original: 次に導き出した君にアンサー
subtitles.english: The next answer I derive is for you.

subtitles.original: 灰になるまで踊ってよう
subtitles.english: Let's dance until we turn to ash.

subtitles.original: ビビデバビデブーワ　ビビデバビデブーワ yeah
subtitles.english: Bibbidi-Bobbidi-Boo-wa Bibbidi-Bobbidi-Boo-wa, yeah

subtitles.original: ビビデバビデブーワ　ビビデバビデブーワ yeah
subtitles.english: Bibbidi-Bobbidi-Boo-wa Bibbidi-Bobbidi-Boo-wa, yeah

subtitles.original: おしゃまらばしちゃうヴィーナス Driving
subtitles.english: A precocious Venus driving.

subtitles.original: 私は大変身メイクアップ　わがままの...
subtitles.english: I'm making a major transformation, makeup, selfish...

subtitles.original: Shut up the mouth です　ガツンとサヨナラ
subtitles.english: Shut your mouth. A blunt goodbye.

subtitles.original: Goodbye 統合だ　いつかは喝采食らう
subtitles.english: Goodbye to integration. Someday, I'll receive applause.

subtitles.original: ウォーリアーズ皆々ご唱和あれ
subtitles.english: Warriors, everyone, sing along.

subtitles.original: ビビデバビデブーワ　ビビデバビデブーワ yeah
subtitles.english: Bibbidi-Bobbidi-Boo-wa Bibbidi-Bobbidi-Boo-wa, yeah

subtitles.original: こんがらがっちゃってもしょうがないから　シューズと繋い
subtitles.english: It can't be helped if it gets tangled, so connect with your shoes.

subtitles.original: ビビデバビデブーワ　ビビデバビデブーワ yeah
subtitles.english: Bibbidi-Bobbidi-Boo-wa Bibbidi-Bobbidi-Boo-wa, yeah

subtitles.original: 今夜に明日はないなら　12時に怒涛門勝ちでしょ
subtitles.english: If there's no tomorrow for tonight, it's a landslide victory at 12 o'clock, right?

subtitles.original: Happy New Year!!
subtitles.english: Happy New Year!!

subtitles.original: Happy New Year!
subtitles.english: Happy New Year!

subtitles.original: あけましておめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Happy New Year!

subtitles.original: 今年もよろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: I look forward to working with you again this year!

subtitles.original: 新年一発目は...
subtitles.english: The first one of the new year is...

subtitles.original: 瞬間ハートビート！
subtitles.english: Momentary Heartbeat!

subtitles.original: Happy New Year! あけましておめでとう！
subtitles.english: Happy New Year! Happy New Year!

subtitles.original: ReGLOSS と bu-ia-ra
subtitles.english: ReGLOSS and we are

subtitles.original: Regloss!
subtitles.english: Regloss!

subtitles.original: 新年一発目は...
subtitles.english: The first one of the new year is...

subtitles.original: 瞬間ハートビート！
subtitles.english: Momentary Heartbeat!

subtitles.original: 今年もよろしくね！ yeah！
subtitles.english: Happy new year! yeah!

subtitles.original: 漠然とした不安　欲していた分
subtitles.english: The vague anxiety and the minutes I spent

subtitles.original: 日常に違和感　うんざりしていた
subtitles.english: The discomfort in daily life, I was fed up with it

subtitles.original: 見慣れた景色　足りない眺め
subtitles.english: A familiar view, an insufficient sight

subtitles.original: 理屈を越える変化を求めていた
subtitles.english: I was seeking a change that defies logic

subtitles.original: 窮屈で退屈な日々の中
subtitles.english: In these cramped and boring days

subtitles.original: 突然君は現れた
subtitles.english: Suddenly, you appeared

subtitles.original: 全身の細胞　駆け巡るように
subtitles.english: Like it's racing through every cell in my body

subtitles.original: 走り出した未完成なストーリー
subtitles.english: An incomplete story has started running

subtitles.original: モノクロだった景色が今
subtitles.english: The landscape that was monochrome is now...

subtitles.original: 君と出会えばカラフルに彩る ban-new world
subtitles.english: ...becoming a brand new world, colored brightly by meeting you

subtitles.original: 心奪われた気まぐれな瞬間ハートビート
subtitles.english: My heart was stolen by this whimsical, momentary heartbeat

subtitles.original: 揺ら軸の狭間もう一人じゃない煌めく星
subtitles.english: In the gap of the fluctuating axis, I'm no longer alone, a twinkling star

subtitles.original: 描く未来予想図は同じ夢を引き寄せたいよ
subtitles.english: I want the future blueprint I draw to pull in the same dream

subtitles.original: 果てしない旅路の向こうで鳴り止まない浪漫が待っている
subtitles.english: Beyond the endless journey, a never-ending romance awaits

subtitles.original: 気付いた時にはね I can't live without you
subtitles.english: By the time I noticed, I can't live without you

subtitles.original: いつまでも君と一緒にいなら
subtitles.english: If I'm with you forever...

subtitles.original: これから先広がる宇宙
subtitles.english: ...the universe will expand from here on

subtitles.original: 晴れ渡った空飛び出して気分は上昇想像以上
subtitles.english: Flying out into the clear sky, my mood is rising beyond imagination

subtitles.original: 机上の空論は終わりにして全て叶える空言
subtitles.english: Putting an end to idle talk, making all the impossible dreams come true

subtitles.original: 時計の針が回り回る
subtitles.english: The hands of the clock turn round and round

subtitles.original: 限りない時の中で鮮やかにダンシングタイム
subtitles.english: In the infinite time, a vivid dancing time

subtitles.original: 心奪われた気まぐれな瞬間ハートビート
subtitles.english: My heart was stolen by this whimsical, momentary heartbeat

subtitles.original: 揺ら軸の狭間もう一人じゃない煌めく星
subtitles.english: In the gap of the fluctuating axis, I'm no longer alone, a twinkling star

subtitles.original: 描く未来予想図は同じ夢を引き寄せたいよ
subtitles.english: I want the future blueprint I draw to pull in the same dream

subtitles.original: 果てしない旅路の向こうに鳴り止まない浪漫が待っている
subtitles.english: Beyond the endless journey, a never-ending romance awaits
